name: Beat Blitz
description:
Jump and roll your way through a gauntlet of platforming challenges, all while collecting beats to make dope music! Move to the rhythm of each level to survive. Dodging obstacles and collecting beats will unlock new levels and bonus avatars to change up your style.



[Features]
12 unique levels ranging from casually challenging, to mind-meltingly difficult.
A dope soundtrack with 12 original songs.
An 80’s inspired neon art style.
Simple one-button controls.
